title: Election Firm Knew Data Had Been Sent to China, Prosecutors Say
description: The executive of a small Michigan elections software company was charged with grand theft by embezzlement and conspiracy to commit a crime.

title: F.C.C. Readies Vote on Banning New Huawei and ZTE Devices
description: The vote, which is expected to pass, is required by a law that President Biden signed last year.

title: With New Crackdown, Biden Wages Global Campaign on Chinese Technology
description: U.S. officials pushed to choke off China’s access to critical semiconductor technology after internal debates and tough negotiations with allies.

title: Gaming Is Booming. That’s Catnip for Cybercriminals.
description: Cybersecurity experts warn that threats lurk in cheat codes, microtransactions and messages from fellow players.
